text: Motion
The vice-captain joined the track team, huh?

Yeah... It's just a provisional membership for now,
and they still seem quite anxious.

So, um... Sorry, but the vice-president
won't be in charge of the cover anymore.

We talked about how being in two clubs
might be too much of a burden...

Yeah, that makes sense...! So, should we think
of another plan? Or is it already decided?

No...
It was a sudden decision, so not yet...

We'll discuss it with the student council, but we were
wondering if we could come up with something ourselves...
Okay, let's think... What should we do...?

Well then...
What about the photos...?

!!
We have plenty of photos!
Right!
We just need to pick the best one from them...

There are a lot of good photos,
but it's difficult to choose just one...
Yes...

Well then...
Instead of choosing...

If we....
cram in a lot...
That's it...! / That's right...! / Exactly...!
You mean collage!

Wow...!
It's going to look amazing!

There's still more to cover in the interview,
so maybe we'll find even better photos.
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
